entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.2.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow fallback to email mfa to skip sms setup by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/323
  • Update react-sdk build config for react19 by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/325
  • Fix typing export issue in sdks by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/326
  • Update to latest wrangler version by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/327
  • Add an S2S API to generate impersonation refresh_token by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/328
  • Add client side integration of impersonation by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/329
  • Clear stored account in storage after load refresh token from query string by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/330
  • Fix secret generate script in wrangler@4 by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/332
  • Update admin-panel doc about worker to worker request limitation by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/333
  • Add iss to access_token by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/335
  • Support clean logs by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/336
  • Suppress clean log buttons based on access by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/337
  • Support suppress language switch on admin panel by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/338
  • Add doc for how to allow a custom role to perform impersonation by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/339

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.7...v1.2.8

entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.2.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Exposure idToken from sdks by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/340
  • Support replace email verification with welcome email by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/343
  • Verify user status on token exchange with refresh token by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/347
  • Support app level mfa config by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/348
  • Support update user's org through s2s and admin panel by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/349
  • Allow disable public registration on an org by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/350
  • Add empty hooks to allow developers extend server with less git conflict by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/351
  • Add more tests to admin panel by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/352
  • Fix server-test-coverage-badge CI by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.8...v1.2.9

entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add basic embedded auth api setup by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/354
  • Support sign-in and token exchange with embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/355
  • Add sign-up and sign-out endpoint to embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/356
  • Support app consent through embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/358
  • Support send reset password email in embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/359
  • Support email mfa in embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/360
  • Support otp mfa in embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/361
  • Support sms mfa in embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/362
  • Support otp and sms initial setup in embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/363
  • Support mfa enroll in embedded api by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/364
  • Add embedded auth api doc by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/365

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.9...v1.3.0
